content:
facilities named its new executive director Tuesday afternoon PERIOD

Allan M PERIOD Stratman was appointed to the position PERIOD This decision awaits clearance by the Universitys Board of Trustees which is expected to approve the move at its July meeting PERIOD Stratman is scheduled to start Sept PERIOD  PERIOD

With the hire the University announced that the term services will be dropped from the Facilities and Services title to articulate transitions in the operations PERIOD So the unit will no longer be responsible for overseeing the Universitys printing and parking services PERIOD
title: Facilities announces new executive director, change in name - The Daily Illini
name: University of Illinois Urbana Champaign
